title: Amazon Graphic Designer
job_overview:
We are looking for a talented Amazon Graphic Designer with proven experience in creating high-converting product images for Amazon and other e-commerce platforms. If you have a keen eye for design and understand what makes a listing stand out, we want you on our team!

Key Responsibilities:
Design high-quality product images, infographics, A+ Content, and storefront graphics optimized for Amazon.
Ensure all images follow Amazon’s style guides and best practices for maximum visibility and conversion.
Edit and enhance product images to highlight key features and benefits.
Implement feedback and make necessary revisions to maintain brand consistency.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a graphic designer with a strong Amazon portfolio (product images, A+ Content, or storefront designs).
Proficiency in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and other graphic design tools.
Understanding of Amazon listing requirements, image optimization, and e-commerce design trends.
Strong attention to detail and creativity.
Ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects efficiently.

If you're passionate about creating visually compelling product images that drive conversions, we’d love to hear from you!
